    Generic for UI generation

ui_code(x, ns)

    Arguments

    x

    Object for which to generate UI components

    result

    Block result

    output

    Shiny output

    state

    Block state

    ...

    Generic consistency

    id

    UI IDs

    name

    Field name

    session

    Shiny session

    ns

    Output namespace
